document_data.name: Aec'Letec
document_data.mainbody: '''Aec'Letec''' was a powerful [[nabassu]] from the [[Abyss]] that was worshiped by a group of cultists from the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Abilities:
While on the [[Prime Material Plane]], Aec'Letec was capable of "resurrecting" himself in a manner, so long as one of the cultists involved with his resurrection was still alive.

He was completely impervious to both fire and lightning. His gaze was capable of holding an individual in place and transforming them into a [[ghoul]] after a short period of time.
document_data.History:
Centuries before the [[Era of Upheaval]], Aec'Letec was freed from the Abyss and released onto [[Toril]] by cultists that worshiped him as a god. He was defeated shortly thereafter, by [[Durlag Trollkiller]] and [[Arlo Stoneblade|Arlo]] of [[Clan Stoneblade]]. While the latter wound up dying from wounds he incurred in this battle, together they managed to imprison the [[tanar'ri]]'s "essence" within the [[artifact]] known as the ''[[Soultaker dagger]]''. The dagger was then lost to time within [[Durlag's Tower]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, [[Tracea Carol]] and their fellow cultists sought the ''Soultaker dagger'' to free Aec'Letec from his imprisonment and let him loose upon [[Faer√ªn]] in [[Ulgoth's Beard]]. [[Hurgan Stoneblade]] went searching after the dagger as well, in order to put a stop to their plan.
